com.example.aiplant.cameraandgallery

Class ImagePicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.aiplant.cameraandgallery.ImagePicker

  • public class ImagePicker
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that allows the user to choose a picture form gallery or open a new phone camera intent. Author: Mario Velasco Casquero Source: https://gist.github.com/Mariovc/f06e70ebe8ca52fbbbe2

      • getPickImageIntent

        public static android.content.Intent getPickImageIntent(android.content.Context context)
        This method creates a bottom sheet for choosing which image intent to open
        Parameters:
        context - gets the context of the application
        Returns:
        returns the intent chosen by the user

      • getImageFromResult

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getImageFromResult(android.content.Context context,
                                                         int resultCode,
                                                         android.content.Intent imageReturnedIntent)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        This method gets the picture from the chosen intent
        Parameters:
        context - gets the context of the application
        resultCode - is the standard result of the operation
        imageReturnedIntent - this is the intent from which the method will get the picture
        Returns:
        returns the bitmap format of the picture
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                               android.net.Uri imageUri,
                               boolean isCamera)
        This method rotates the pictures
        Parameters:
        context - gets the context of the application
        imageUri - is the Uri reference of the picture
        isCamera - checks if the intent is the camera, else being the gallery
